Rugby: Magpies chasing a moment in history in NPC semifinal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/rugby-magpies-chasing-a-moment-in-history-in-npc-semi-final/KGIAZBOZ4ZDMVEX3DES2OYLDIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/rugby-magpies-chasing-a-moment-in-history-in-npc-semi-final/KGIAZBOZ4ZDMVEX3DES2OYLDIE/ Doug LaingIn comparison with Hawke's Bay's Ranfurly Shield rugby, the NPC record is not so crash-hot Thu, 12 Oct 2023 19:00:00 +0000 Magpies prop Pouri Rakete-Stones (with ball) impacting off the bench against Wellington in Napier in 2020.
